page.shortlink: api client api a5 viewbox set layout method
page.description: Sets the active ViewBox layout. Assumes the ViewBox was designed to have multiple layouts.

argument.name: layoutName
argument.description: The layout to set for the ViewBox.

section.title: Example
section.example: var vbObj = {dialog.object}.getControl('MYVIEWBOX1'); //get pointer to the ViewBox vbObj.setLayout('layout2');
